main event: A sighting of an unidentified flying object described as a yellowish ball moving upwards, reported in Folcroft, Pennsylvania on August 5, 1963.
interesting points: The observer mentioned giving a photograph of the UFO to NASA, which was not returned., The sighting involved a hand-drawn sketch indicating the path of the observed object., The object's physical description included being bright but not extremely bright, with sharply defined edges., Witness described the object as about the size of a basketball seen at a distance., The event is characterized by various conflicting data in the report.
witness description: A 19-year-old student interested in space and space travel.
